title: Laser Drill
toolpower: [img:Axe mask] 150%
summaries: The Laser Drill is a Hardmode, post-Golem drill that is dropped by most ground-based enemies during the Martian Madness event / the Martian Saucer. It produces a drill beam that extends up to 11 tiles in length. It also boasts the highest pickaxe power of any Pickaxe or Drill in the entire game at 230%.
Its best modifier is Godly, as Drills cannot receive any modifiers that affect speed, but the Laser Drill can still receive knockback boosts.
